game.name: Picto-Cross: 1 nonogram per day
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Picto-Cross is a 2D logic puzzle game with a minimalist style, known as nonograms, featuring a total of 371 puzzles based on historical events or celebrations that occur throughout the year.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Picto-Cross is a 2D logic puzzle game with a minimalist style, known as nonograms, featuring a total of 371 puzzles based on historical events or celebrations that occur throughout the year.
